mapper.select: SELECT a.PARAMETER_CODE AS "KEY" ,a.PARAMETER_NAME AS "VALUE" FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER a JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER_CATEGORY b ON a.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = b.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.STATUS = b.STATUS AND b.STATUS = 1 AND b.SYSTEM_ID = 'eservice_jd' AND b.CATEGORY_CODE = 'JDZQ_LEVEL_STATES_CATEGORY' ORDER BY a.SORT_NO

SELECT a.PARAMETER_CODE AS "KEY" ,a.PARAMETER_NAME AS "VALUE" FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER a JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER_CATEGORY b ON a.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = b.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.STATUS = b.STATUS AND b.STATUS = 1 AND b.SYSTEM_ID = 'eservice' AND b.CATEGORY_CODE = 'PAYMODE_TYPE_JD' ORDER BY a.SORT_NO

SELECT a.PARAMETER_CODE AS "KEY" ,a.PARAMETER_NAME AS "VALUE" FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER a JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER_CATEGORY b ON a.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = b.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.STATUS = b.STATUS AND b.STATUS = 1 AND b.SYSTEM_ID = 'eservice' AND b.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} ORDER BY a.SORT_NO
SELECT BANK_ID AS "KEY", BANK_NAME AS "VALUE" FROM ESERVICE.DBO.BANK_INFO WHERE BRANCH_ID = 'root' AND DISPLAY = 'Y' ORDER BY BANK_ID
SELECT DISTINCT DEP_ID, BRANCH_ID FROM ESERVICE_JD.DBO.USER_IC UD WHERE UD.USER_ID = #{userId} and DEP_ID = #{vo.depId}
